title: Encore of Episode 15: Loss and Renewal
description: Maya Shankar was well on her way to an extraordinary career as a violinist when an injury closed that door. This week, we look at how she wound up at the top of another field: the social sciences.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
